Package com.goodworkalan.comfort.io

Interface Summary
FindFilter Differs from Java FileName filter in that it file base is not the directory that contains the file, but the base directory where the recursive find was performed.
 

Class Summary
Files Utility methods for files and directories.
Find A utility class representing a query against the file system.
Glob A glob pattern for matching files.
 

Exception Summary
ComfortIOException A general purpose exception that indicates that an error occurred in one of the classes in the comfort.io package.
